channel.title: Salt Tectonics on Zoltán Sylvester
channel.description: Recent content in Salt Tectonics on Zoltán Sylvester

item.title: Giant meandering channel evolution, Campos deep-water salt basin, Brazil
item.description: This paper analyzes the evolution of giant meandering submarine channels in the Campos Basin, Brazil, and their interaction with salt diapirs. Published in *Geosphere*, 2021.
